item.title: A Man Is Linked to the Brutal ‘Yogurt Shop Murders’ 34 Years Ago
item.description: Police said they used DNA to identify a suspect in the Austin killings known as the yogurt shop murders. The case has haunted the city for decades.

item.title: Iranians Brace for Economic Impact of New U.N. Sanctions
item.description: Already suffering a 40 percent inflation rate and critical shortages of power and water, many in Iran expect conditions to get worse.
